en.title: FE Donates Baht 100,000 to Thailand Assoc of The Blind 20th February 2009!!
en.content: FE continues to support the less fortunate of society. At the recent Thailand Achievers Recognition Dinner on 20th February 2009, FE donated Baht 100,000 to the Thailand Association of The Blind. By taking the lead to support and help the less fortunate of society FE hopes to developed a culture of caring, sharing and giving amongst FE's members. The multiplier effects of such social entrepreneurship on society can be enormous. FE hopes to build a legacy that will continue well into the future, something we can all be very proud of!

meta.description: At the recent Thailand Achievers Recognition Dinner on 20th February 2009, FusionExcel donated Baht 100,000 to the Thailand Association of The Blind. By taking the lead to support and help the less fortunate of society FusionExcel hopes to develop a culture of caring, sharing and giving amongst FusionExcel's members. FusionExcel hopes to build a legacy that will continue well into the future, something we can all be very proud of!
meta.keyword: Thailand Achievers Recognition Dinner, donated Baht 100,000, Thailand Association of The Blind, caring culture, build a legacy
meta.author: klhunter
